hymn.title: We give thanks to Thee O Lord

layout.singingstanza: We give thanks to Thee, O Lord, We give thanks. We give thanks to Thee, O Lord, We give thanks. For Thy name is near; Thy won -- drous works men de -- clare— We give thanks to Thee O Lord, We give thanks. For Thou, Lord, art high— A -- bove all the earth. Thou art ex -- alt -- ed Far a -- bove all gods. For Thou, Lord, art high— A -- bove all the earth. Thou art ex -- alt -- ed Far a -- bove all gods. We ex -- alt Thee; we ex -- alt Thee; We ex -- alt Thee, O Lord! We ex -- alt Thee; we ex -- alt Thee; We ex -- alt Thee, O Lord!

lyrics.stanza: We give thanks to Thee, O Lord, We give thanks. We give thanks to Thee, O Lord, We give thanks. For Thy name is near; Thy wondrous works men declare— We give thanks to Thee O Lord, We give thanks.
For Thou, Lord, art high— Above all the earth. Thou art exalted Far above all gods. For Thou, Lord, art high— Above all the earth. Thou art exalted Far above all gods.
